scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identified by his mitre and vestments, stands with a book in his left hand and his right hand raised in blessing or teaching. He is depicted with a halo, indicating sainthood. Facing him, a woman kneels with her hands raised in supplication or prayer. The figures are set against a decorative blue background with a gold diamond pattern, framed by an ornate border of red and blue. The scene is likely a devotional image, possibly depicting a saint interacting with a supplicant.
